
=head1 NAME

case_study

=head1 DESCRIPTION



=head1 FIELDS

 lexicon_identifier (character varying) - 
 context_identifier (character varying) - 
 term (character varying) - 
 term_identifier (character varying) - 
 relationship_identifier (character varying) - 
 gcid (character varying) - 
 description (character varying) - 
 timestamp (timestamp(3) without time zone) - 


=head1 SCHEMA

                                 View "gcis_metadata.case_study"
          Column          |              Type              | Modifiers | Storage  | Description 
 -------------------------+--------------------------------+-----------+----------+-------------
  lexicon_identifier      | character varying              |           | extended | 
  context_identifier      | character varying              |           | extended | 
  term                    | character varying              |           | extended | 
  term_identifier         | character varying              |           | extended | 
  relationship_identifier | character varying              |           | extended | 
  gcid                    | character varying              |           | extended | 
  description             | character varying              |           | extended | 
  timestamp               | timestamp(3) without time zone |           | plain    | 
 View definition:
  SELECT t.lexicon_identifier,
     t.context_identifier,
     t.term,
     m.term_identifier,
     m.relationship_identifier,
     m.gcid,
     m.description,
     m."timestamp"
    FROM term t,
     term_map m
   WHERE t.identifier::text = m.term_identifier::text AND m.relationship_identifier::text ~~ '%hasCaseStudy'::text;
 

=cut
